articles.description: Samsung Galaxy S20 FE is listed in the Flipkart Smartphone Carnival sale with a discount of Rs. 5,000, with its price starting at Rs. 44,999. Furthermore, Flipkart is also offering extra Rs. 7,000 on exchange of an old phone. The Redmi Note 9 Pro Maxalso has …
articles.content: Flipkart Smartphone Carnival sale is now taking place on the e-commerce platform, and a host of smartphones are listed with deals and discounts. Phones like the iPhone SE, iPhone XR, Realme C12, Poco… [+1920 chars]

articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: Oppo overtakes Huawei to lead Chinese smartphone market for first time - The Verge
articles.description: Oppo took 21 percent of the Chinese smartphone market in January, according to Counterpoint Research. The figure means Oppo overtook Huawei and became the leading smartphone vendor in China for the first time.
articles.content:
The Find X3 Pro is coming this week
